edu.wit.dcsn.comp2000.common

Class Node<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wit.dcsn.comp2000.common.Node<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The class of items the Node will reference.

    public class Node<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Node provides the basis for singly linked-list functionality
    Version:
    4.1, 4.6.0 2020-01-28 extracted Node from LinkedBag, 4.7.0 2020-08-08 switched class from package-private to public, 4.8.0 2020-11-04 add toString() to aid debugging
    Author:
    Frank M. Carrano, Timothy M. Henry, David M Rosenberg
